source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers non-refundable overseas transport and accommodation expenses paid in advance if the trip is cancelled due to specified reasons.

COVID-19 related cancellation is covered up to $15,000 if it results in serious sickness. The event must occur after policy purchase and within 30 days before leaving Singapore. Policy must be bought three days (or earlier) before departure unless the event is accidental.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 3, 'Up to $15,000...' & Page 10, Note 5 & Page 11, Note 10

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Full terrorism cover applies up to the benefit limit or terrorism limit, whichever is lower.
COVID-19 cover applies subject to fulfilling vaccination/testing requirements and policy conditions.
Covers additional transport or accommodation expenses incurred due to postponing the trip for specified reasons.
Full terrorism cover applies up to the benefit limit or terrorism limit, whichever is lower.
COVID-19 cover applies subject to fulfilling vaccination/testing requirements and policy conditions.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person
Limit for extra expenses to return to Singapore - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers non-refundable expenses and additional costs to return to Singapore if the trip is shortened due to specified reasons, including COVID-19.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 2, Item 1 & Page 3, 'Up to $15,000...' & Page 5, Section 3 & Page 10, Note 5

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Full terrorism cover applies up to the benefit limit or terrorism limit, whichever is lower.

base_limits.type: Overall section limit - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable if the scheduled public transport is delayed for more than six consecutive hours and the delay is not caused by you.

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Full terrorism cover applies up to the benefit limit or terrorism limit, whichever is lower.

Payable if denied boarding on scheduled public transport due to overbooking and no alternative transport is made available within 6 hours.

Post-departure purchase extension applies to this benefit.

Full terrorism cover applies up to the benefit limit or terrorism limit, whichever is lower.
COVID-19 cover applies subject to fulfilling vaccination/testing requirements and policy conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension does NOT apply to this benefit.

coverage_categories.category_name: Personal Accident and Medical Expenses Benefits

conditional_limits.condition: Public transport double cover for accidental death

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides compensation based on a scale for accidental death or permanent disability occurring during the trip. Scale includes: Accidental death (100%), Permanent total disability (100%), Loss of two or more limbs (100%), Loss of sight in both eyes (100%), Loss of one limb (50%), Loss of sight in one eye (50%), Loss of speech (50%), Loss of hearing (50%). Total compensation cannot exceed the maximum benefit limit.
Full terrorism cover applies up to the benefit limit or terrorism limit, whichever is lower.
COVID-19 cover applies subject to fulfilling vaccination/testing requirements and policy conditions.
Post-departure purchase extension applies to this benefit.

base_limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over (combined for sections 14, 18 and 19)
Limit for medical aids and equipment - Per insured person

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers necessary medical expenses incurred overseas due to injury or sickness, including treatment by a Chinese medicine practitioner or chiropractor (subject to Section 16 limits).

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Includes coverage up to $1,000,000 for treatment relating to COVID-19 while overseas (based on Preferred plan for adult under 70).

Overall section limit - Adult under 70 years old

Covers expenses for emergency medical evacuation to Singapore or the nearest appropriate medical facility if necessary due to serious injury or sickness overseas. Limit for Adult 70+ is combined with Sections 14 and 19 (S$350,000 total).

COVID-19 cover applies subject to fulfilling vaccination/testing requirements and policy conditions.

Covers expenses for returning mortal remains to Singapore or for local burial/cremation overseas in the event of death during the trip. Limit for Adult 70+ is combined with Sections 14 and 18 (S$350,000 total).

COVID-19 cover applies subject to fulfilling vaccination/testing requirements and policy conditions.

Covers participation in recreational activities commonly available to the public for leisure, provided safety procedures are followed, under guidance/supervision if available, and not excluded. Examples: scuba diving (PADI certified or with instructor, max depth per certification/30m), paddleboarding, white water rafting, skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling, bungee jumping, skydiving, paragliding, abseiling, hiking, trekking (below 4,000m, public access or organised tour/guide), motorcycling, hot air ballooning.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 2, Item 3 & Page 3, 'Coverage for adventurous activities'

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Scuba diving requires PADI (or similar) certification diving with a similarly certified buddy, or diving with a qualified instructor. Max depth as per certification or 30m, whichever is shallower.
Trekking covered below 4,000m if in a public area without restriction, organised by a recognised commercial operator, or under licensed guide/instructor supervision with safety compliance.
Excludes extreme sports involving speed, height, danger, high physical exertion, specialized gear, or stunts.

Coverage period automatically extended at no extra cost for the first 14 days if unable to return before policy expiry due to delay of public transport (not caused by you) or hospitalisation advised by a medical practitioner.

base_limits.limit: Within 1 day after departure from Singapore

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Policy can be purchased within one day after departing Singapore (only applicable to Per-trip plans).

Provides cover under sections 3 to 27 (except section 8). Does not cover claims arising from, related to, or taking place on transport taken before purchase, known events, or losses occurring before purchase.

Covers 1 or 2 adults (spouses/partners, >=16 yrs, parent/legal guardian) and any number of their children (<21 yrs, biological/adopted/ward). All must be insured under the same policy. Must travel together for single trip plans.
Family total is the maximum amount payable per benefit section for the family during one trip. Each insured person is still subject to the maximum benefit per insured person limit.
